title: Did Rudy Giuliani Call for ‘Trial by Combat’ Before Trump Mob Broke Into Capitol?
subtitle: After a violent mob descended on the U.S. Capitol, the rhetoric of Trump's surrogates came under scrutiny.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump's personal attorney, Rudy Giuliani, called for "trial by combat" before a violent mob of Trump supporters broke into the U.S. Capitol.
